comment: Though this is managed by a commercial entity, participants can gain entrance to high level decision making: Agreements are required for community members and for Oracle employees before they can obtain the role of Leader or Developer in Projects and use the core development infrastructure on the site. However, agreements are not required for the role of Participant in Projects, and agreements are not required for any role in Community Groups and User Groups. For more detail see the Roles & Collectives document. http://hub.opensolaris.org/bin/view/Main/site-user-guide
